title: JJ Redick, Big Ben Is A Warrior And Guys On Chicks
description:
Games all day every day has the whole crew in a great mood. Conversation about the bubble, high thoughts and hockey.(2:05-12:05) Hot Seat Cool Throne including the XFL, Big Ben being more injured than anyone ever and the debut of Stool Streams (GET EXCITED). (12:52-32:01) JJ Redick joins us from the bubble to talk about launching his new podcast, Zion rules, NCAA and how he needs to become hateable again. (34:20-1:13:06) Segments include Billyâ€™s big sheet (1:15:00-1:19:19) and guys on chicks (1:19:20-1:26:53)
